datacenter.zeitreihen
Class Channel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--datacenter.persistent.Persistent
        |
        +--datacenter.zeitreihen.Channel
public class Channel
extends Persistent

Channel is a specific DataObject owned by a Container.

See Also:
Persistent, Container, Computation, TimeserieWrapper

GetComputations

public Computation[] GetComputations(boolean refresh)
builds an array of Computation that this Channel owns.

Parameters:
refresh - set it to true if you want to repoll the database, else it will use the cached ones.
Returns:
array of Computation
